commercial_license_reply.subject: EVEZ Visual Cognition Layer — Commercial License
commercial_license_reply.body:
Thanks for reaching out about the EVEZ Visual Cognition Layer.

EVEZ VCL is dual-licensed:

**Community (AGPL-3.0)**
Free for open-source projects. Full source at github.com/EvezArt/evez-os.

**Commercial License**
Required if you're building proprietary software, closing source, or deploying in a commercial product.

Tiers:
- Solo / Indie ($49/mo or $399/yr) — 1 developer, 1 product
- Studio ($199/mo or $1,599/yr) — up to 5 developers
- Enterprise (custom) — unlimited seats, SLA, support

To purchase: github.com/sponsors/EvezArt (select Commercial tier)

Questions? Reply here. I'll get back to you same day.

— EVEZ
